member.name: M:CVRManagerDAL.CodeType.Clone
member.summary: Creates and returns a clone of this object.
member.returns: A reference to the cloned object.

member.name: M:CVRManagerDAL.CodeType.ToString
member.returns: The identifier value.

member.name: M:CVRManagerDAL.CodeType.CompareTo(CVRManagerDAL.CodeType)
member.returns: The integer that indicates the order relationship of the objects.
member.remarks:
A negative integer - This instance precedes the compare-to object.
Zero - This instance and the compare-to object have the same position.
A postive integer - This instance follows the compare-to object.
